title: The Shape of Horror
description:
Something lurks in the darkness. Slithering away just out of sight when you turn on the lights. Morphing into the shadows it watches you even now as you listen to this. Don't allow yourself the illusion of safety because horror can take on many shapes and many faces to lure you into the deep black abyss. First, a room for two becomes a room for more. And then, the true story of a haunted movie theater. Followed by our rendition of a classic Creepypasta: The Branches in the Wind. And finally, the Cloaks are coming.
Right now, you can get 20% off your Amazon Smart Lighting Bundle, only at Amazon.com/SCARY
